Class RasterGraphic

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.RasterGraphic
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitmapGraphic, PixmapGraphic
public abstract class RasterGraphic extends Object
RasterGraphic is a raster graphic for DMS display feedback.
Author:
Douglas Lau

    • copy

      public void copy(RasterGraphic rg, int x0, int y0, DmsColor fg)
      Copy another raster graphic onto the raster.
      Parameters:
      rg - RasterGraphic to copy.
      x0 - X-position on raster (0-based).
      y0 - Y-position on raster (0-based).
      fg - Foreground color.
